Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 73rd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/3/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2015, winning 2 games with a 0.59 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2015, going 4-1, 2.65...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/11/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $1,755,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/13/2018, off Alberto Arroyo (KC)...
Injured on 5/15/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/10/2019 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
